content: 2xl 121-130 3xl 131-143 assemble flare round 1 at the bottom of the skirt i am optionally adding a flare make a slip knot on your hook and at the back of the skirt on the bottom row insert your hook and begin to double_crochet in every stitch and increase around 10 times during this round you should have 103 stitches if you made 90 row like i did round 2 increase 6 times this round you should have 109 stitches round 3 switch colors double_crochet in every stitch in the round ending with 109 stitches round 4-6 double_crochet once in every stitch for 109 stitches in each round fold the bottom of the skirt up and line up the bottom with round 3 where you first switched colors seam them together here inner waistband chain 7 row 1 in the 5th stitch treble_crochet continue until the end of the row 3 treble crochets total row 2-x repeat row of 3 treble crochets until the band tightly fits your lower waist where your skirt waistband will sit this will go inside your waist and encase the drawstring attach the band to the top of the inside of your waistband here is a rough idea of how many row you might need depending on your size 26 0 928 xs 23-25 s 25-27 m 28-30 l 30-34 xl 35-38 2xl 39-43 3xl 44-48 the bottom of the band does not need to be as securely attached for example i only attached it at a few places throughout the band bows make 2 i-cords of 3 chain width each around 30 inches long weave them into the waistband of the skirt and have them come out of 2 holes on the sides of the hips tying them together into bows you re done this took me about 12 hours total but i made it during several days i hope you enjoy please - if you used my size guide please let me know on ravelry or @crittercornercrochet on instagram if it worked for you and anything i can change to better accommodate your size in this pattern and in my future patterns
